entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 09:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
